text:
<@U06441ELMEU> wow thats nice, I've read you other post in here regarding this via CRTL+f.
As i said i was thinking this is a problem, but now i am almost certain one needs *content hub* enterprise level to be able to do serverless functions, eith by themselves or as a part of the project.

Turns out my other clients had both *content hub* and *salesHub enterprise.*

Please do let me know if you get to anything.

• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/serverless-functions|docs here >say one needs content hub for serverless functions
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/create-a-project|docs here> say one needs both content hub and salesHub enterpise for serverless functions as part of a project
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/serverless-functions|docs here> say one needs any of salesHub, content Hub or Service Hub
So Which is it :smile:
